columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the trail.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trail.

columns.name: home_region
columns.description: The region in which the trail was created.

columns.name: is_multi_region_trail
columns.description: Specifies whether the trail exists only in one region or exists in all regions.

columns.name: log_file_validation_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether log file validation is enabled, or not.

columns.name: is_logging
columns.description: Specifies whether the CloudTrail is currently logging AWS API calls, or not.

columns.name: log_group_arn
columns.description: Specifies an Amazon Resource Name (ARN), a unique identifier that represents the log group to which CloudTrail logs will be delivered.

columns.name: cloudwatch_logs_role_arn
columns.description: Specifies the role for the CloudWatch Logs endpoint to assume to write to a user's log group.

columns.name: has_custom_event_selectors
columns.description: Specifies whether the trail has custom event selectors, or not.

columns.name: has_insight_selectors
columns.description: Specifies whether a trail has insight types specified in an InsightSelector list, or not.

columns.name: include_global_service_events
columns.description: Specifies whether to include AWS API calls from AWS global services, or not.

columns.name: is_organization_trail
columns.description: Specifies whether the trail is an organization trail, or not.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: Specifies the KMS key ID that encrypts the logs delivered by CloudTrail.

columns.name: s3_bucket_name
columns.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket into which CloudTrail delivers your trail files.

columns.name: s3_key_prefix
columns.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key prefix that comes after the name of the bucket you have designated for log file delivery.

columns.name: sns_topic_arn
columns.description: Specifies the ARN of the Amazon SNS topic that CloudTrail uses to send notifications when log files are delivered.

columns.name: latest_cloudwatch_logs_delivery_error
columns.description: Displays any CloudWatch Logs error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver logs to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: latest_cloudwatch_logs_delivery_time
columns.description: Displays the most recent date and time when CloudTrail delivered logs to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: latest_delivery_error
columns.description: Displays any Amazon S3 error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver log files to the designated bucket.

columns.name: latest_delivery_time
columns.description: Specifies the date and time that CloudTrail last delivered log files to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

columns.name: latest_digest_delivery_error
columns.description: Displays any Amazon S3 error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver a digest file to the designated bucket.

columns.name: latest_digest_delivery_time
columns.description: Specifies the date and time that CloudTrail last delivered a digest file to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

columns.name: latest_notification_error
columns.description: Displays any Amazon SNS error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to send a notification.

columns.name: latest_notification_time
columns.description: Specifies the date and time of the most recent Amazon SNS notification that CloudTrail has written a new log file to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

columns.name: start_logging_time
columns.description: Specifies the most recent date and time when CloudTrail started recording API calls for an AWS account.

columns.name: stop_logging_time
columns.description: Specifies the most recent date and time when CloudTrail stopped recording API calls for an AWS account.

columns.name: advanced_event_selectors
columns.description: Describes the advanced event selectors that are configured for the trail.

columns.name: event_selectors
columns.description: Describes the event selectors that are configured for the trail.

columns.name: insight_selectors
columns.description: A JSON string that contains the insight types you want to log on a trail.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the trail.
